name: Americano
description: Classic black coffee with hot water
steps: Pull 2 shots of espresso into cup
notes: Ask customer: milk or black?
Can be made iced - use cold water and ice

name: Flat White
description: Double shot with steamed milk and microfoam
steps: Pull 2 shots of espresso into cup
notes: Microfoam should be silky and smooth
For iced version: use cold milk and ice

name: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam
steps: Pull 2 shots of espresso into cup
Dust with cocoa powder if requested
notes: Traditional ratio is 1:1:1
Foam should be thick and creamy

name: Latte
description: Espresso with lots of steamed milk and light foam
steps: Pull 2 shots of espresso into cup
Add thin layer of foam on top
notes: Most popular milk coffee drink
Can add flavored syrups

name: Mocha
description: Chocolate and coffee combination with steamed milk
steps: Stir to combine chocolate and espresso
notes: Can use cocoa powder instead of syrup
Popular with customers who want something sweet

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich chocolate drink with steamed milk
steps: Pour small amount of milk and stir to create paste
notes: Great for non-coffee drinkers
Can add peppermint or caramel flavoring

name: Matcha Latte
description: Japanese green tea powder with steamed milk
steps: Add small amount of hot water
notes: Whisk matcha thoroughly to avoid lumps
Can be made iced with cold milk

name: Iced Coffee Frappe
description: Blended iced coffee with whipped cream
steps: Add espresso, ice, milk, and sugar to blender
notes: Can add chocolate or caramel syrup
Blend until ice is completely crushed

name: Berry Smoothie
description: Fresh berry blend with yogurt and honey
steps: Check consistency - add more milk if needed
notes: Can substitute with any frozen fruit
Add protein powder if requested

name: Earl Grey Tea
steps: Pour hot water over tea bag
Add lemon and sweetener if requested
notes: Don't over-steep or it becomes bitter
Can be served iced

name: Lemon Mint Spritzer
description: Refreshing sparkling water with lemon and mint
steps: Add fresh lemon juice and simple syrup
Garnish with lemon wheel and mint sprig
notes: Don't over-muddle mint (bitter)
Can add cucumber for variation
